original_title: Дима Гаврилов: Речь Стива Джобса перед выпускниками Стэнфордского университета
overview: Dima Gavrilov talks about first dates, being late, coffee, and the poisoning of Alexei Navalny. Everything that is said here is jokes and nothing but jokes.
title: Dima Gavrilov: Steve Jobs Stanford Commencement Speech
